From MetaCoq.Template Require Import config utils Ast Typing.


Section Normal.
  Context (Œ£ : global_env).

  Inductive normal (Œì : context) : term -> Prop :=
  | nf_ne t : neutral Œì t -> normal Œì t
  | nf_sort s : normal Œì (tSort s)
  | nf_prod na A B : normal Œì A -> normal (Œì ,, vass na A) B ->
                     normal Œì (tProd na A B)
  | nf_lam na A B : normal Œì A -> normal (Œì ,, vass na A) B ->
                    normal Œì (tLambda na A B)
  | nf_cstrapp i n u v : All (normal Œì) v -> normal Œì (mkApps (tConstruct i n u) v)
  | nf_indapp i u v : All (normal Œì) v -> normal Œì (mkApps (tInd i u) v)
  | nf_fix mfix idx : All (normal Œì ‚àò dbody) mfix ->
                      normal Œì (tFix mfix idx)
  | nf_cofix mfix idx : All (normal Œì ‚àò dbody) mfix ->
                        normal Œì (tCoFix mfix idx)

  with neutral (Œì : context) : term -> Prop :=
       | ne_rel i :
           option_map decl_body (nth_error Œì i) = Some None ->
           neutral Œì (tRel i)
       | ne_var v : neutral Œì (tVar v)
       | ne_evar n l : neutral Œì (tEvar n l)
       | ne_const c u decl :
           lookup_env Œ£ c = Some (ConstantDecl decl) -> decl.(cst_body) = None ->
           neutral Œì (tConst c u)
       | ne_app f v : neutral Œì f -> Forall (normal Œì) v -> neutral Œì (tApp f v)
       | ne_case i p c brs : neutral Œì c -> 
            (* FIXME context of the branch can contain let-ins *)
            Forall (normal Œì ‚àò bbody) brs ->
            neutral Œì (tCase i p c brs)
       | ne_proj p c : neutral Œì c -> neutral Œì (tProj p c).

  Inductive whnf (Œì : context) : term -> Prop :=
  | whnf_ne t : whne Œì t -> whnf Œì t
  | whnf_sort s : whnf Œì (tSort s)
  | whnf_prod na A B : whnf Œì (tProd na A B)
  | whnf_lam na A B : whnf Œì (tLambda na A B)
  | whnf_cstrapp i n u v : whnf Œì (mkApps (tConstruct i n u) v)
  | whnf_indapp i u v : whnf Œì (mkApps (tInd i u) v)
  | whnf_fix mfix idx : whnf Œì (tFix mfix idx)
  | whnf_cofix mfix idx : whnf Œì (tCoFix mfix idx)

  with whne (Œì : context) : term -> Prop :=
  | whne_rel i :
      option_map decl_body (nth_error Œì i) = Some None ->
      whne Œì (tRel i)
  | whne_var v : whne Œì (tVar v)
  | whne_evar n l : whne Œì (tEvar n l)
  | whne_const c u decl :
      lookup_env Œ£ c = Some (ConstantDecl decl) -> decl.(cst_body) = None ->
      whne Œì (tConst c u)
  | whne_app f v : whne Œì f -> whne Œì (tApp f v)
  | whne_case i p c brs : whne Œì c -> whne Œì (tCase i p c brs)
  | whne_proj p c : whne Œì c -> whne Œì (tProj p c).
End Normal.
